title: Musselburgh
name: Musselburgh Racecourse
content: Musselburgh Links has hosted horse racing since 1816, when the development of the docks at [[Edinburgh/Leith|Leith]] put a stop to race meetings on the sands there. After significant investment in facilities over the last decade or so, the course has now been rated a 5-star attraction by Visit Scotland. Hosts races around once a fortnight throughout the year, both flat and National Hunt.
